email.title: DoCSoc Weekly Digest
email.text:
Hi everyone!
We hope you all had a great fresher's week! Whatever you're learning or working on next week, we've got a load of great events lined up for you!

event.text:
## PDT Partners - Information and Q&A Session
Come along to meet one of this years sponsors, PDT Partners, learn about what they do and find out about the opportunties they have available.
You can register [here](https://app.tickettailor.com/events/docsoc/1421924/r/mailshot).

## DoCSoc Mums and Dads
If you've signed up to be a child or a parent, come along on Wednseday to meet your family and get some free pizza.
Parents' sign-up is now closed but if you're a fresher you can sign up [here](family.docsoc.com), get in quickly as sign-ups will close Monday at 5pm.

## Sponsors Exhibition
Join us to meet some of the biggest names in tech, finance and more, at one of our biggest events of the year!
All our Gold and Silver Sponsors will be in attendance, including Arctic Lake, Marshall Wace, Angstrom, DRW, PDT Partners, QRT, G-Research, incident.io, Optiver, The Trade Desk, Jump Trading, Netcraft and Ocado.
Make sure to bring your student ID or other evidence to show you're a member of DoCSoc.

## Internships 101
Come along to this Q&A to find out about the world of internships. Learn about applications, what happens and the opportunities you can get.
You can register [here](https://app.tickettailor.com/events/docsoc/1421929/r/mailshot).

## The Terrible Ideas Hackathon
DoCSoc is happy to announce we are sponsoring the Imperial edition of the Terrible Ideas Hackathon! Come along to a chill hackathon with the goal to create the most terrible, awful, brilliant ideas you can think of! From robot-driven tattoo guns and soleless Jandals to vegemite flavoured fudge and the world's most professionally bad D&D module, join us in a celebration of failure, creativity, and stupid, terrible decisions.
You can sign up and learn more [here](https://terriblehack.com/events/london).

event.location: PDT Partners, Yarnwicke, 119-121 Cannon Street, London, EC4N 5AT
event.text:
## PDT Sponsors Exhibition Afterparty
Join PDT partners for an informal meet and greet to get to know folks from our engineering team in a more casual setting and check out our office.
You can sign up [here](https://pdtpartners.co1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_bJX5cqmVPKARArQ).
